item.title: Black manhattan
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml rye whisky or bourbon
  • 30 ml amaro
  • 2 dashes aromatic bitters
  • 2 dashes orange bitters
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry

Instructions

  1. Stir ingredients.
  2. Serve in a cocktail glass.
  3. Garnish with a cocktail cherry.

item.title: Old fashioned
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 4 dashes aromatic bitters

Instructions

item.title: Paper plane
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 20ml Aperol
  • 20ml Amaro Nonino or Montenegro
  • 20ml lemon juice
  • (garnish) lemon twist

Instructions

item.title: Whiskey sour
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 60 ml bourbon
  • 30 ml lemon juice
  • 15 ml sugar syrup
  • 4 dashes orange bitters
  • 1/2 egg white (optional)
  • (garnish) cocktail cherry
  • (garnish) orange twist

Instructions

  1. Dry shake ingredients.
  2. Then shake with ice and double strain.
  3. Serve in a rocks glass over fresh ice.
  4. Garnish with orange twist and cocktail cherry.
